LanguageData.BioferritePlate.label: bioferrite plate
LanguageData.BioferritePlate.description: Heavy plate flooring made from smoothed bioferrite. While ugly and slightly flammable, it's quick to clean and increases the containment strength of nearby holding platforms.
LanguageData.Voidmetal.label: void metal
LanguageData.Voidmetal.description: This slick dark surface is disorienting to look at. The near-featureless surface seems to shift constantly, but is cold and hard to the touch. It evokes the sense of a malevolent force lurking under the surface, waiting to reach up and pull you into the depths.
